metadata.title: CVE-2020-12693 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Slurm 19.05.x before 19.05.7 and 20.02.x before 20.02.3, in the rare casewhere Message Aggregation is enabled, allows Authentication Bypass via anAlternate Path or Channel. A race condition allows a user to launch aprocess as an arbitrary user.

criterions.comment: slurm-llnl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
